title: Love
message: Living by the love of God before the God of love. Loving one's neighbor as oneself.

title: Peace
message: Living in peace with all men. Having respect for one another.

title: Passion
message: Living by praying, fasting, and thanksgiving. Living by the righteousness of Christ, Peace with all men, and the joy of the Holy Ghost.

title: Support
message: Praying down the power of God for the dismantling of the works of darkness. Caring for the helpless, particularly widows, orphans, and the neglected in our society.
